HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: This update adds automatic crop-rotation to growing zones. After harvesting a crop, pawns will sow the next available crop selected. The automatic rotation is only available on zones where the base crop is a harvestable plant and not a tree.

This update adds multiple changes that can all be changed in the mod-options. There is now two research-projects for the auto-rotation. Basic for rotation between two crops, advanced between any amount of crops. A new option for requiring three crop-rotation for yield to increase while two only stops it from lowering. A new option for rotation to just lowering the yield at half the rate of not rotating. A new option to let yield improve by burning crops, letting some percent of their current growth get added to the yield-calculations for the following crops. A new option to make yield improve over time if no crop is sown, up to the normal 100%. Also added information to the growing-zone info to show the average yield-modifier for the zone.
Thank you for all suggestions, makes this mod fun to expand upon!

There is now a controlled way to start crop-fires to increase yield. The growing zone will now have a Burn Crops gizmo that will cause a pawn to come over and set the field on fire. They will then stay and watch the fire to not let it spread outside of the field.
